meta.title: QR Code Generator - WebTool Stack
meta.description: Quickly convert a URL or text into a QR code and download QR code.

qrCodeGenerator.title: QR Code Generator
qrCodeGenerator.description: Use this tool to quickly convert URLs or text into QR codes.

steps.1: Enter your desired URL or text in the input area.
steps.2: The QR code will be generated automatically in real-time as you type.
steps.3: Click the 'Save QR Code' button to save the generated QR code as a PNG image.
steps.4: Use the saved QR code wherever you need it (business cards, posters, websites, etc.).

security.title: Security and Privacy
security.description: We prioritize the protection of your personal information. All input data is processed solely on the client-side and is never stored or transmitted to any server. This ensures that your data remains secure and private.

freeUsage.title: Free Service
freeUsage.description: This QR code generator is provided completely free of charge. You can use it immediately without any software installation or registration. There are no usage limits, allowing you to generate high-quality QR codes as many times as you need.

steps.1: Real-time QR Code Generation: QR codes are created instantly as you type.
steps.2: High-Quality Images: Provides clear, easily scannable high-resolution QR codes.
steps.3: Versatile Input Support: Convert various data formats including URLs, plain text, and contact information into QR codes.
steps.4: User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive and easy-to-use design accessible to everyone.
steps.5: Instant Download: Download your generated QR codes immediately in PNG format.

useCases.title: Use Cases
useCases.description: QR codes can be useful in various scenarios:

steps.1: Adding website links to business cards or promotional materials
steps.2: Linking online booking pages on event posters
steps.3: Providing links to detailed information pages on product packaging
steps.4: Connecting physical menus to online menus

steps.1: Make sure the QR code is large enough for easy scanning.
steps.2: Use contrasting colors to improve readability.
steps.3: Regularly test your QR codes to ensure they're working properly.
steps.4: If necessary, add a brief explanation or call-to-action next to the QR code.
